text: Xindao de renmen a! Nimen dang fucong an la, yingdang fucong shizhe he nimen zhong de zhushi ren, ruguo nimen wei yi jian shi er zhengzhi, nimen shi na jian shi gui an la he shizhe (panjue), ruguo nimen quexin an la he mori dehua. Zhe duiyu nimen shi biyi geng duo de, zhe yeshi zui meihao de jieshi
